title: launch button doesnt work
body: when i start up my client and hit the launch button to go to the loggin screen it doesnt work it gets grey out and doesnt work it just sits there i had this problem for like 2 years now but it hasnt been this bad usually it works after a while i havent been able to play in like 2 weeks i tried using the repair button but that doesnt work either i click it and it goes away like i never clicked it. i also tried uninstalling and re-downloading it didnt work

replies.body: Typically this is a result of a connection hiccup which prevents the Terms of Use window from popping up. We're still searching for a root cause on this. In the meantime, I'd recommend following the [Troubleshooting Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) which should help with this. Lemme know if you still run into problems.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5EbMN0Qw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-21T19:06:57.125+0000)
>
> Typically this is a result of a connection hiccup which prevents the Terms of Use window from popping up. We're still searching for a root cause on this. In the meantime, I'd recommend following the [Troubleshooting Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) which should help with this. Lemme know if you still run into problems.

are you talking about the eula that pops up cuz it pops up i hit accept and it goes away sometimes it does it twice still doesnt go to log in screen

Hmm.  I would still recommend trying the connection troubleshooting steps, but if you've done that and it's still not working, go ahead and open a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a deeper look at what's going on.
